attributes.action: Stop the current MP's Increase of 1.5% & protect the lowest paid workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today Bill Cockburn Chairman of the SSRB announced that MP's can have an increase in their salaries of: 1.5%, bringing their salaries upto: £65,737.00 per year.

While many lowest paid workers and Public Sector workers are due to have a wage freeze or job cut.

I urge this so called fair Government to think VERY hard so near to the General Election on wether we should increase/decrease the Rich & Poor divide.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
